name: PLFetchedObjectsController
summary: A controller for observing changes to managed objects - like an NSFetchedResultsController but with less magic.
description:
A class similar to NSFetchedResultsController that is closer to the
metal and not tied to table views. Given a managed object context and
a fetch request, it will monitor additions, changes, or deletions to
objects in context that match that predicate, and it will notifiy its
 delegate.
